mapper.select: SELECT id, title, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM titles ORDER BY updated_at DESC
SELECT id, title, created_at, updated_at FROM titles WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY updated_at
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO titles(title, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{title}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE titles SET updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM titles WHERE id = #{id}; DELETE FROM threads WHERE title_id = #{id}
